role.descr: mention of activity done in putty-duddy fashion

example.name: invented example, only vpc is attested
example.text: Mary told John she wouldn't marry him because he merely putty-duddies through life.

roleset.name: phrasal usage of acting like putty-duddy (variant of fuddy-duddy?)

role.descr: mention of activity done in putty-duddy fashion

example.name: discourse usage
example.text: But I just feel like I 'm -- You 're opening yoursel- -- **putty - duddying** around for the rest of my life .
example.arg: for the rest of my life
